description: This PHP source file manages the web UI for editing wireless network configuration settings (SSID, security, channels, passwords) for a specific radio band (2.4 GHz or 5 GHz) on a gateway device, including form handling, validation, and dynamic UI interactions.

methods.name: KeyExtGet
methods.description: Retrieves multiple wireless configuration parameters from device via an external function, returning a key-value pair array.

methods.name: showDialog
methods.description: Displays a dialog for selecting security modes, updating form options accordingly.

methods.name: click_save
methods.description: Collects form data and submits the updated wireless configuration to the server via AJAX.

methods.name: setResetInfo
methods.description: Triggers a reset or restore of default Wi-Fi settings via AJAX based on provided info.

methods.name: init_form
methods.description: Initializes form fields and UI state based on current device settings and user permissions.
